## pathwidth
* graphclasses.org: [pathwidth](https://www.graphclasses.org/classes/par_9.html)
* [â†—](https://mathworld.wolfram.com/Pathwidth.html) The pathwidth of a graph $G$, also called the interval thickness, vertex separation number, and node searching number, is one less than the size of the largest set in a path decomposition G.
